events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer position with an impressive portfolio and detailed resume.
Application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords found in the resume such as developer and software experience.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the candidate’s hiring process and coordinate next steps.
Recruiter conducted an initial phone screening; candidate showed strong foundational knowledge of software development practices.
Candidate responded promptly to the recruiter’s follow-up email confirming availability for technical interview next week.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating solid coding skills and knowledge of system design.
HR interview scheduled for May 15th to discuss cultural fit and employment terms following successful technical round.
